sourcesContent:
import { Box, ImageList,ImageListItem,ImageListItemBar, styled  } from '@mui/material'
import React from 'react'
import image1 from '../../img/desktop-cat-bolsos.webp'
import image2 from '../../img/desktop-cat-carteras.webp'
import image3 from '../../img/desktop-cat-viajes.webp'
import image4 from '../../img/desktop-cat-hombre.webp'



const BannerCateg = ({responsive}) => {

    const BannerImage= styled('img')(()=>({
        width:'100%',
        objectFit: 'cover',
        position:'absolute'

    }))

  return (
    
    // con flex que tenga condicional de 45% si es mediano, pequeño, de 25% si es grande
    <Box >
        <ImageList  sx={{display:'flex', flexDirection:'row', flexWrap:'Wrap', width:'100%',
                         justifyContent:'space-around', height:'min-content'}}>
            <ImageListItem  sx={{height:'min-content',width: (responsive.desk) ? '20%' : '45%'}}>
                <BannerImage src={image1} alt='bolsos'/>
                <ImageListItemBar title="bolsos" 
                                  sx={{position:'relative',
                                  textAlign:'center',
                                  textTransform:'uppercase',
                                  bottom: '50%',}} />
            </ImageListItem>
            <ImageListItem  sx={{width: (responsive.desk) ? '20%' : '45%'}}>
            <BannerImage src={image2} alt='carteras'/>
            <ImageListItemBar title="carteras"  />
            </ImageListItem>
            <ImageListItem  sx={{width: (responsive.desk) ? '20%' : '45%'}}>
            <BannerImage src={image3} alt='viajes'/>
            <ImageListItemBar title="viajes" />
            </ImageListItem>
            <ImageListItem  sx={{width: (responsive.desk) ? '20%' : '45%'}}>
            <BannerImage src={image4} alt='hombre'/>
            <ImageListItemBar title="hombre" />
            </ImageListItem>
        </ImageList>
    </Box>
  )
}

export default BannerCateg
